room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: That was an awesome experience I would recommend to others! That was great breakout game ever and scary at the Mystery Mansion

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: This was our first time doing something like this, but we had a blast. We did the mansion with 4 adults and 3 teens. We almost got out, but needed another 5 minutes. The host did a great job giving us subtle hints when we were spending too much time in the weeds. Very well done, lots of fun and we all plan to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Took my fianc√©e and her sister and mother. It was a blast. We did Mystery Mansion and it was very challenging. Our Game Master, Lilly, was super helpful and did well guiding us. We didn't break out, but we will be back for more!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: We did the Mystery Mansion last night, and we must have been entertaining to watch to say the least! We didn't make it, but not for the lack of poor Lilly trying to help. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Mystery Mansion" by Breakout Games - Knoxville in Knoxville
review: My friend and I went to the Mystery Mansion room for my 20th birthday. We had so much fun. I have done one of the rooms before but she had not. Every time I go, the employees are so nice and want you to have a good time. We even broke out! Plan on coming back next week.
